main event: A bright, glowing object was observed moving erratically across the sky near Dyke, Virginia on July 7, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to hover, then speed up, slow down, and move about the sky in a zig-zag fashion.
The object had a very bright light in the center, surrounded by a dimmer glow.
The object was estimated to be approximately the size of a basketball at arm's length and about 0.5 mile away from the witness.
The object was observed for approximately 20 minutes before accelerating and disappearing from sight.
Several other people in the neighborhood also reported seeing the strange object.
sighted object: a round, glowing object with a bright light in the center
